data.text:
Related Resources

More has been written on Abraham Lincoln than any other individual in American history, and that trend will likely continue well into the future. As such, the resources included below are not intended to form a comprehensive list of materials related to Abraham Lincoln, but rather to be suggestive of sources for further exploration.

Updated, November 2021

Selected Archival Collections Elsewhere

As a prolific writer during his legal, political and presidential careers, documents written by Abraham Lincoln exist in public and private manuscript collections throughout the United States and around the world. Collections relating to Abraham Lincoln are almost as numerous. The following, in particular, include significant resources related to Abraham Lincoln:
